ingredients: 1 teaspoon butter, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 3 teaspoons vanilla sugar, 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 6 large apples - peeled, cored, and sliced, 3   +   1/2 tablespoons water
